data.title: Korean food coma
data.text:
OMG!!! I was so excited to find Korean food within a 30 mile radius. I have been craving dumplings and kimchi for two weeks, since visiting a Korean restaurant in Duluth. 

The owner is friendly and the food is excellent! (The restaurant ambiance is far from swanky, but the food is worth the 30 min. drive.)

My son and I shared the beef dumplings appetizer. I had the pan fried kimchi with boiled tofu, and my son had the spicy seafood noodle soup. We were both stuffed. I told him that I'd gladly sacrifice my figure for this food! I'm still in the restaurant... Can't move.... Food coma... And I love it!

I think we will add this to our rotation monthly.

data.title: Authentic Korean!
data.text:
I love Seoul House! My wife and I have been eating there for about 7 years. I've lived in Korea, so I can attest to the authenticity of the food. The owner is a sweet Korean lady who does most of the cooking and food prep herself.

The traditional fresh kimchi, cucumber kimchi and other appetizers are always tasty and come in traditional small bowls before the meal. The dwaeji bulgoki (spicy pork) and beef bulgoki are excellent. My children, ages 7 and 4, like the japchae (noodles and vegetables).

The service can be a little slow at times, but relax, you're basically getting a meal cooked by your surrogate Korean grandmother! The food is worth the wait if you want good Korean. I like this restaurant much better than Korean restaurants I've eaten at in The Atlanta area. Enjoy!

data.title: What?   What?
data.text: I have never seen this restaurant, HOWEVER, had I............I would have been all over this!!!!!!!!!!  Where is it located and I will rock you with a review!

data.title: Best Korean food!
data.text:
Me and my friend stumbled upon this place while driving around Warner Robbins today. After seeing the sing for the place I made my buddy pull over I had to try it. I will say I was glad we stopped buy. Ordered some food to go fast service and very friendly the food was outstanding and the price was great.
Definitely going back!

data.title: Only Your Mom's Cooking Taste Better
data.text: We have been regulars at Seoul since it first opened. We've tried other Korean restaurants in town, but always come back to Seoul House. Ms. Kim’s cooking is excellent; plus she always has a smile on her face, always willing to please and the price is very reasonable. Occasionally you may have to wait on the food due to short staffing, but it is worth it.
